personalInfo.name: ANOUAR TIZGUI
personalInfo.summary: Dedicated and skilled Web Developer and Email Marketer with a strong foundation in software design, development, and maintenance, coupled with expertise in crafting effective email marketing campaigns. Proficient in multiple programming languages and frameworks, with a passion for problem-solving and creating efficient solutions. Seeking to contribute to innovative projects as a dynamic team member.

experience.title: Email Marketer
description: Develop, execute, and monitor email marketing campaigns that align with brand strategies.
Write engaging subject lines, email copy, and calls-to-action to improve open and click-through rates.
Track metrics such as open rates, click rates, and conversion rates to measure campaign success.
Monitor email deliverability, manage sender reputation, and resolve issues to maintain high inbox placement rates.
Work with design, sales, and product teams to align email campaigns with larger business goals.

experience.title: Laser Technician
description: Installed and commissioned laser systems according to client specifications.
Configured laser parameters based on application requirements.
Implemented safety measures to minimize risks associated with laser operations.
Collaborated with engineering teams to enhance system performance.
Maintained comprehensive documentation of installations and maintenance tasks.

experience.title: Intern
description: Created high-fidelity Figma mockups for a restaurant homepage, including sections for restaurant details, featured dishes, and customer reviews.
Used React to implement the design, making it responsive and interactive.

education.institution: Specialized institute of Applied Technology (ISTA), Tinghir
Moulay Abdellah Ben Hssain High School, Tinghir

certifications: English for Tourism - Restaurant Service, Allsson Oct 2021
